sourcesContent:
import "./InfoToolTip.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import success from "../../images/assets/shared/success.png"; const InfoToolTip = ({ isOpen, order }) => { return (

THANK YOU FOR YOUR ORDER

You will receive an email confirmation shortly.

  • {order.products.name}

    {`$ ${order.products.price}`}

    • {`and ${ order.products.length - 1 } other item(s)`}

    GRAND TOTAL

    {`$ ${order.grandTotal}`}

    BACK TO HOME
    ); }; export default InfoToolTip;
